author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Check out courses in your favorite subjects on Brilliant! Start learning for free at https://brilliant.org/sabine/ and get 20% off a premium subscription, which includes daily unlimited access!

I have been alerted that black holes don’t exist, again. This isn’t the first time I have been asked to assess an argument which seems to prove that black holes aren’t real, but let’s take a look at all the new developments in this debate.

title: Do Black Holes Exist? Some Physicists Don’t Think So
